|chip2 = Intel;; |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = U.FL |antenna = |txchains = 1 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 150/150 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = Yes |addchip = |flags = WiMAX, DFS, |802dot11_protocols = abgn |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 09/18/2008 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== :1x2 SIMO + WiMAX, Dual Chip ==Notes== ===Variants=== *512ANX HMW - Supports 802.16e and 802.11a/b/g/Draft-N :in a PCle Half Mini Card form factor *512AGX HRU - Supports 802.16e and 802.11a/b/g :in a PCIe Half Mini Card form factor *512ANX MMW - Supports 802.16e and 802.11a/b/g/Draft-N :in a PCIe Mini Card form factor *512AGX MRU - Supports 802.16e and 802.11a/b/g :in a PCIe Mini Card form factor Use iwleeprom tool to patch firmware of AGX adapters to enable 802.11n. *[https://habr.com/ru/post/107817/ ''Intel 5150 AGX (HRU/MRU)'' on '''Habr'''] (RU) • on [http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:51214 '''iXBT''' forums] (RU) :8086:1201 — Full, 11n enabled, OEM √ :8086:1206 — Full, 11n disabled, OEM - :8086:1301 — Half, 11n enabled, OEM √ :8086:1306 — Half, 11n disabled, OEM - :8086:1211 — Full, 11n enabled, HP/Lenovo/IBM √ :8086:1216 — Full, 11n disabled, HP/Lenovo/IBM - :8086:1311 — Half, 11n enabled, HP/Lenovo/IBM √ :8086:1316 — Half, 11n disabled, HP/Lenovo/IBM - ==PCI IDs==
